means: （轻轻或漫不经心地）扔( toss的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The seas grew turbulent, tossing the small boat like a cork.
sentence.Network_cn: 海浪变得汹涌澎湃，把小船像漂浮的软木塞一样抛来甩去。

sentence.Network_en: Two boys were in the street, tossing a baseball back and forth.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个男孩在街上来来回回地投接棒球。

sentence.Network_en: Poor Joan has been tossing around all night with that fever.
sentence.Network_cn: 可怜的琼因发烧而一整夜辗转不能入睡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: torsional stress 扭应力tossing 洗矿total absorption 总吸收量
righteous adj.正直的, 正当的, 正义的tossing 动的行为或过程shorts n.短裤
The boy . is tossing a coin ., 那个男孩子抛起了一枚硬币.
tossing 抖出隐私或丑闻, tossing 拍掉剩余盐, tossing 抖摇

与扔纸团(PAPER TOSS)和忍者跳跃(NINJUMP )出自同一游戏制作商，一款新颖的塔防游戏，融入了RPG元素，玩家将扮演打击恶魔 …
关于off,on,down,up的短语_百度知道 ... bite off 咬掉,啃去;中断 toss off v.一饮而尽,轻而易举地处理 fuck off 滚蛋[开].
用英语说中国菜 - sunquancai的日志 - 网易博客 ... chicken laesar salad 卤鸡色拉 tossed salad 油拌色拉 rump steak 牛腿排.

entry.def: If you toss something somewhere, you throw it there lightly, often in a rather careless way.

example.ex: He screwed the paper into a ball and tossed it into the fire...
example.tran: 他把纸揉成一团扔进火里。

example.ex: He tossed his blanket aside and got up…
example.tran: 他把毯子掀到一边起了身。

entry.tran: (常表示愤怒或轻蔑地)甩(头或头发)
entry.def: If you toss your head or toss your hair, you move your head backwards, quickly and suddenly, often as a way of expressing an emotion such as anger or contempt.

example.ex: 'I'm sure I don't know.' Cook tossed her head...
example.tran: “我确信我不知道。”库克一甩头说。

example.ex: Gasping, she tossed her hair out of her face.
example.tran: 她气喘吁吁地把头发从脸上甩开。

entry.def: In sports and informal situations, if you decide something by tossing a coin, you spin a coin into the air and guess which side of the coin will face upwards when it lands.

example.ex: We tossed a coin to decide who would go out and buy the buns.
example.tran: 我们掷硬币决定谁出去买小圆面包。

entry.def: The toss is a way of deciding something, such as who is going to go first in a game, that consists of spinning a coin into the air and guessing which side of the coin will face upwards when it lands.

example.ex: Bangladesh won the toss and decided to bat first.
example.tran: 孟加拉国队掷硬币赢了，决定先击球。

entry.def: If something such as the wind or sea tosses an object, it causes it to move from side to side or up and down.

example.ex: The seas grew turbulent, tossing the small boat like a cork...
example.tran: 海浪变得汹涌澎湃，把小船像漂浮的软木塞一样抛来甩去。

example.ex: As the plane was tossed up and down, the pilot tried to stabilise it.
example.tran: 飞机上下颠簸，飞行员试图将其稳住。

entry.def: If you toss food while preparing it, you put pieces of it into a liquid and lightly shake them so that they become covered with the liquid.

example.ex: Do not toss the salad until you're ready to serve...
example.tran: 到快上菜时再轻轻搅拌色拉。

example.ex: Add the grated orange rind and toss the apple slices in the mixture...
example.tran: 加入磨碎的橙皮，再将苹果片在其中轻拌。

entry.tran: 为不重要的事争论不休
entry.def: If you say that someone argues the toss, you are criticizing them for continuing to argue for longer than is necessary about something that is not very important.

example.ex: They were still arguing the toss about the first goal...
example.tran: 他们仍在为第一个进球争论不休。

example.ex: They spend so much time arguing the toss over inconsequential matters.
example.tran: 他们花了这么多时间为无关紧要的事争个没完。

entry.def: If you say that you do not give a toss about someone or something, you are emphasizing that you do not care about them at all.

example.ex: Well, who gives a toss about sophistication anyway?...
example.tran: 嗯，不管怎样，谁会在意高雅时髦呢？

example.ex: I don't give a toss what people think…
example.tran: 我才不在乎人们怎么想呢。

entry.def: If you toss and turn, you keep moving around in bed and cannot sleep properly, for example because you are ill or worried.

example.ex: You feel as if you've been tossing and turning all night, and wake up feeling worn out.
example.tran: 感觉就像整夜翻来覆去睡不着、醒来时浑身疲惫一样。

auth_sentence.content: The tossing waves,...the snowy, curling caps.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tossing waves,...the snowy, curling caps.

auth_sentence.content: Sheikh Muktar Robow says tossing grenades is not enough.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sheikh Muktar Robow says tossing grenades is not enough.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sheikh Muktar Robow says tossing grenades is not enough.

auth_sentence.content: Fold in the mushrooms, tossing until dark and damp.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fold in the mushrooms, tossing until dark and damp.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fold in the mushrooms, tossing until dark and damp.
